member.name: M:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Api.GetVersion
member.summary: Returns the API version of CounterStrikeSharp running on the server

member.name: M:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Api.GetVersionString
member.summary: Returns the assembly version of CounterStrikeSharp running on the server as a string including git commit hash

member.name: M:CounterStrikeSharp.API.NativeObject.As``1
member.summary: Returns a new instance of the specified type using the pointer from the passed in object.
member.remarks: Useful for creating a new instance of a class that inherits from NativeObject. e.g. var weaponServices = playerWeaponServices.As<CCSPlayer_WeaponServices>();

members.member: Indicates that the parameter should be pulled from the ScriptContext as the passed in type, then cast/converted to the parameter type.

member.name: M:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.Attributes.MinimumApiVersion.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.summary: API version that this plugin requires to work correctly.

member.name: M:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.BasePlugin.RegisterEventHandler``1(CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.BasePlugin.GameEventHandler{``0},CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.HookMode)
member.summary: Registers a game event handler.
member.typeparam: The type of the game event.
member.param: The mode in which the event handler is hooked. Default is `HookMode.Post`.

member.name: M:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.BasePlugin.DeregisterEventHandler``1(CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.BasePlugin.GameEventHandler{``0},CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.HookMode)
member.summary: De-registers a game event handler.

member.summary: Registers a new server command.

member.summary: Adds a command listener which will be called before or after the command is executed on the server by a player.
member.param: Code to run when command is executed. Return or higher to prevent command execution.
Whether to hook before or after the command is executed.

member.summary: Adds a timer that will call the given callback after the specified amount of seconds. By default will only run once unless the flag is set.
member.param: Code to run when timer elapses
Controls if the timer is a one-off, repeat or stops on map change etc.
member.returns: An instance of the

member.summary: Registers all attribute handlers on the given instance. Can be used to register event handlers, console commands, entity outputs etc. from classes that are not derived from `BasePlugin`.

member.summary: Registers all entity output handlers that are decorated with the attribute.

member.name: T:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.Commands.PluginCommandManagerDecorator
member.summary: Decorator for that tracks registered commands and removes them when disposed. Used for plugins that register commands to ensure they are removed when the plugin is unloaded.

member.name: T:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.CoreConfigData
member.summary: Serializable instance of the CoreConfig

member.name: T:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.CoreConfig
member.summary: Configuration related to the Core API.

member.name: P:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.CoreConfig.PublicChatTrigger
member.summary: List of characters to use for public chat triggers.

member.name: P:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.CoreConfig.SilentChatTrigger
member.summary: List of characters to use for silent chat triggers.

summary.para: Per , certain plugin functionality will trigger all of the game server owner's Game Server Login Tokens (GSLTs) to get banned when executed on a Counter-Strike 2 game server.

Enabling this option will block plugins from using functionality that is known to cause this.
Note that this does NOT guarantee that you cannot
receive a ban.
Disable this option at your own risk.

member.name: P:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.CoreConfig.PluginHotReloadEnabled
member.summary: When enabled, plugins are automatically reloaded when their .dll file is updated.

member.name: P:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.CoreConfig.PluginAutoLoadEnabled
member.summary: When enabled, plugins are automatically loaded from the plugins directory on server start.

member.name: T:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.FunctionLifetime
member.summary: Describes the lifetime of a function reference.

member.name: F:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.FunctionLifetime.SingleUse
member.summary: Delegate will be removed after the first invocation.

member.name: F:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.FunctionLifetime.Permanent
member.summary: Delegate will remain in memory for the lifetime of the application (or until is called).

member.name: T:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.FunctionReference
member.summary: Represents a reference to a function that can be called from native code.

member.name: P:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.FunctionReference.CompletionTask
member.summary: For function references, this task will complete when the function has finished invoking.

member.name: T:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.HookMode
member.summary: Specifies the hook mode.

member.name: F:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.HookMode.Pre
member.summary: The hook is called before the original method.

member.name: F:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.HookMode.Post
member.summary: The hook is called after the original method.

member.name: T:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.HookResult
member.summary: Represents the result of a hook.

member.name: F:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.HookResult.Continue
member.summary: Continue processing the hook to other listeners.

member.name: F:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.HookResult.Changed
member.summary: The hook result has been changed. Currently unused.

member.name: F:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.HookResult.Handled
member.summary: The hook has been handled. The original method will not be called, but other hooks will still be called.

member.name: F:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.HookResult.Stop
member.summary: Stop processing the hook. The original method will not be called, and other hooks will not proceed after this one.

member.name: T:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.Hosting.IScriptHostConfiguration
member.summary: Provides information about the CounterStrikeSharp host configuration.

member.name: P:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.Hosting.IScriptHostConfiguration.RootPath
member.summary: Gets the absolute path to the directory that contains CounterStrikeSharp files. e.g. /game/csgo/addons/counterstrikesharp

member.name: P:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.Hosting.IScriptHostConfiguration.PluginPath
member.summary: Gets the absolute path to the directory that contains CounterStrikeSharp plugins. e.g. /game/csgo/addons/counterstrikesharp/plugins

member.name: P:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.Hosting.IScriptHostConfiguration.SharedPath
member.summary: Gets the absolute path to the directory that contains CounterStrikeSharp plugin shared APIS. e.g. /game/csgo/addons/counterstrikesharp/shared

member.name: P:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.Hosting.IScriptHostConfiguration.ConfigsPath
member.summary: Gets the absolute path to the directory that contains CounterStrikeSharp configs. e.g. /game/csgo/addons/counterstrikesharp/configs

member.name: P:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.Hosting.IScriptHostConfiguration.GameDataPath
member.summary: Gets the absolute path to the directory that contains CounterStrikeSharp game data. e.g. /game/csgo/addons/counterstrikesharp/gamedata

member.name: T:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.IPlugin
member.summary: Interface which every CounterStrikeSharp plugin must implement. Module will be created with parameterless constructor and then Load method will be called.

member.name: P:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.IPlugin.ModuleName
member.summary: Name of the plugin as it will appear in the plugin list.

member.name: P:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.IPlugin.ModuleVersion
member.summary: Module version as it will appear in the plugin list.

member.name: P:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.IPlugin.ModuleAuthor
member.summary: Author of the plugin as it will appear in the plugin list.

member.name: P:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.IPlugin.ModuleDescription
member.summary: Brief description of the plugin as it will appear in the plugin list.

member.name: M:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.IPlugin.Load(System.Boolean)
member.summary: This method is called by CounterStrikeSharp on plugin load and should be treated as plugin constructor. Called with `true` on a hot reload (DLL file replaced in plugins folder)

member.name: M:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.IPlugin.Unload(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Will be called by CounterStrikeSharp on plugin unload. In this method the plugin should cleanup any extra resources. Event handlers, listeners etc. will automatically be deregistered.

member.name: M:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.IPlugin.OnAllPluginsLoaded(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Will be called by CounterStrikeSharp after all plugins have been loaded. This will also be called for convenience after a reload or a late l oad, so that you don't have to handle re-wiring everything.

member.name: P:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.IPlugin.ModulePath
member.summary: The path to the plugin's DLL file.

member.name: T:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.IPluginConfig`1
member.summary: An interface that describes a plugin configuration.

member.name: M:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.IPluginConfig`1.OnConfigParsed(`0)
member.summary: Called when the `ConfigManager` has parsed the configuration file for this plugin

member.summary: Represents a service collection configuration for a plugin.

member.summary: Used to configure services exposed for dependency injection.

member.name: M:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.CCSPlayerController.ChangeTeam(CounterStrikeSharp.API.Modules.Utils.CsTeam)
member.summary:
Switches the team of the player, has the same effect as the "jointeam" console command.
This follows gamemode rules, so this will usually cause a player suicide/loss of weapons.

member.name: M:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.CEntityInstance.AcceptInput(System.String,CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.CEntityInstance,CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.CEntityInstance,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary:
Calls a named input method on an entity, this will bypass the map IO event queue system.
entity.AcceptInput("Break");
member.param: Entity which initiated the action, for no entity
Entity that is sending the event, for no entity
String variant value to send with the event

member.name: M:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.CEntityInstance.AddEntityIOEvent(System.String,CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.CEntityInstance,CounterStrikeSharp.API.Core.CEntityInstance,System.String,System.Single,System.Int32)
member.summary:
Calls a named input method on an entity, conforming to the map IO event queue system.
entity.AddEntityIOEvent("Break");
member.param: Entity which initiated the action, for no entity
Entity that is sending the event, for no entity
String variant value to send with the event
Delay in seconds before calling the input

member.name: T:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Modules.Utils.Angle

Xpitch +down/-up
Yyaw +left/-right
Zroll +right/-left

member.summary: Duration of a single game tick in seconds, based on a 64 tick server (hard coded in CS2).

member.summary: Executes a command on the server, as if it was entered from the console.

member.name: P:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Server.TickedTime
member.summary: Returns the total time the server has been running in seconds.
member.remarks: Does not increment when server is hibernating

member.name: P:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Server.CurrentTime
member.summary: Returns the current map time in seconds, as an interval of the server's tick interval. e.g. 70.046875 would represent 70 seconds of map time and the 4483rd tick of the server (70.046875 / 0.015625).
member.remarks: Increments even when server is hibernating

member.name: P:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Server.TickCount
member.summary: Returns the current map tick count. CS2 is a 64 tick server, so the value will increment by 64 every second.

member.name: P:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Server.EngineTime
member.summary: Returns the total time the server has been running in seconds.
member.remarks: Increments even when server is hibernating

member.name: P:CounterStrikeSharp.API.Server.FrameTime
member.summary: Returns the time spent on last server or client frame
